data.title: Events and Travel
data.meta_description: Events and Travel - Brooks School provides a co-educational, college preparatory program for 370 students in grades 9 through 12.
data.text:
Register below to receive the link and attend.

October 17: Diversity, Equity, Inclusion and Belonging at Brooks

7 to 7:45 p.m. EST — We welcome you to learn about DEIB in the Brooks community from Dean of DEIB Terri Ofori.

• October 21: Chat with Parents

7 to 7:45 p.m. EST — You're invited to "drop in" and talk with current parents who will share their experiences and answer any questions you may have.

October 28: All About Student Life at Brooks

7 to 7:45 p.m. EST — Hear from student leaders and Director of Student Affairs Ingrid Knowles about what it's like to be a part of the Brooks School community. What do students do for fun? How does living on campus work, exactly? Outside of the classroom, what will my days and nights be like at Brooks? Get answers to questions like these and ask whatever you'd like!

November 4: Financial Aid Information Session

7 to 7:45 p.m. EST — Please join Director of Financial Aid and Associate Director of Admission Patrick Foley to discuss tuition and financial aid at Brooks. He is happy to answer any questions you may have.

November 18: All About Academics at Brooks

7 to 7:45 p.m. EST — Hear from Dean of Academic Affairs Currie Joya Huntington about course offerings, the academic program and our signature programs, as well as internship opportunities at Brooks and beyond.

November 20: Drop-In Chat with the Acting Head of School

8 to 8:45 a.m. EST— Join Acting Head of School Nina Freeman in a casual conversation with prospective families. She's happy to answer any of your questions.

December 5: All About Arts at Brooks

7 to 7:45 p.m. EST — Hear from members of the arts faculty about course offerings, as well as opportunities to explore the arts outside of the classroom at Brooks.

• January 9: Drop-In Chat with the Head of School

7 to 7:45 p.m. EST— Join Head of School John Packard in a casual conversation with prospective families. He's happy to answer your questions.
